# Boots of the Cat
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 1st 

**Slot** feet

**Price** 1,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

These high-soled blue boots provide a great deal of comfort and arch support while also making the wearer appear a little bit taller than normal. The bootâ€™s wearer always takes the minimum possible damage from falls (as if the GM had rolled a 1 on each die of damage incurred by the fall) and at the end of a fall always lands on his feet.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Feather Fall (Spell)|feather fall]]*

**Cost** 500 gp

**Source:** Ultimate Equipment, pg. 229
